title: A Befitting Stage!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Mari, I heard you instantly abducted Honoka to the mountains the other day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What? You mean the time when I took her to play in the highlands?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That sounds like it. Honoka had so much fun, she won’t stop telling us about how fast your helis were everyday<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow, Mari is glad she enjoyed it. Mari also had so much fun♪ Do you want to ride it too, Nico?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Fufufu…. Nico has been waiting for that word. But! This number one idol in the universe, Nico Nii, wants to use that heli for a stage performance!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>For a stage performance? How grandiose~. But that sounds interesting! How do you want to use it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Umm, Nico is still thinking about that part, but something like having me come down from the heli, or having confetti dropped from the heli….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmm~, if you’re going to use helis, how about using 4 helis to lift the stage into the air? That’s a nice idea, me! We have to think about the safety stuff, but it won’t be interesting if we don’t do that much~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haah!? Lift the stage!? Wait, you don’t have to go that far…. Nico didn’t really ask for that, you know….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No no! It’s the least we have to do if we want to make a stage that befits the number one idol in the universe. I’ll check if we can get 4 helis prepared. Give me a minute~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Wait, there’s no way we could do a flying stage! Hold on! Mari! Mariii--!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
